title: Health Conversation Agent API
author: Charana H U, Pavan Purohit, Mohit Sharma
description:
A FastAPI-based application that provides AI-generated responses for health-related conversations using IBM WatsonX AI and Milvus vector database. This API allows clients to send participant data and receive personalized responses generated by AI models. 
1. AI-Powered Responses: Generate personalized health advice using IBM WatsonX AI models.
2. Vector Database Integration: Efficient strategy data retrieval using Milvus vector database.
3. Conversation History: Maintain conversation history for each user.
4. RESTful API: Easy-to-use API endpoints for integration with other services.
